content: I don't have access to current market trends for wearable robots, but it is possible that the cost of wearable robots will decrease as technology advances and becomes more accessible. currently, some exoskeletons are already in use in medical rehabilitation and occupational settings, and the cost of such devices varies depending on their complexity and functionality. however, it is difficult to predict when such technologies will become affordable for the average person, as it depends on factors such as availability, demand, and production costs. i encourage you to stay updated on advancements in this field and keep an eye out for any new developments or technological breakthroughs that may disrupt the market and make these technologies more affordable in the future.
